caption: In a dimly lit room, there were several people. A man was lying next to a gigantic creature, which was trying to move away from him. The man sat at a table. In a car, several people were making phone calls. A man in a white uniform approached the creature. On a major street, a parade was passing by. Parade participants waved to onlookers, and there was a marching band playing music behind them. A young girl was surrounded by two women. A group of people gathered around a dining table. The girl went to her room. A man held up a sign to get her attention, and he tried to climb out the window.

global.question: When does the things in the video happens, ancient age, modern age or future?(Does the technology exists on earth?)
Are there more then five different places appear in the video(scene switch doesn't necessarily means a place change)?
Is there more than three different characters appear(not including people in the background)?
what time does the video take place?(at day time or night time?)
global.answer: Both at day time and at night time.

global.question: Where does the video take place? Indoors or outdoors?

breakpoint.answer: He is tring to stand up.

breakpoint.answer: A white coat and short pants.

breakpoint.answer: The weather is sunny and nice.
